languages.text: {n}Улыбка архмилитанта становится еще более хищной. Моргнув, вы прозреваете истину — вот он, эпицентр скверны. Черным водоворотом энергии Хаоса бушуют вокруг Серого Вортена и тянут свои уродливые когтистые щупальца к Каллигосу, смыкаясь на шее и пронзая сердце Вольного Торговца.{/n}

{n}The Arch-Militant's smile becomes even more bestial. You blink, and your eyes finally see the truth — there it is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, Chaos energy rages wildly around Worten the Grey, reaching for Calligos, trying to close its hideous clawed tentacles around the Rogue Trader's neck and pierce his heart.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Улыбка архмилитанта становится еще более хищной. Моргнув, вы прозреваете истину — вот он, эпицентр скверны. Черным водоворотом энергии Хаоса бушуют вокруг Серого Вортена и тянут свои уродливые когтистые щупальца к Каллигосу, смыкаясь на шее и пронзая сердце Вольного Торговца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Arch-militant's smile becomes even more predatory. Blinking, you finally see the truth — here he is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, the Chaos energy rages wild around Worten the Grey and reaches for Calligos, closing its ugly clawed tentacles on the neck and piercing the heart of the Rogue Trader.{/n}

{n}The Arch-militant's smile becomes even more predatory. Blinking, you finally see the truth — here he is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, the Chaos energy rages wild around Worten the Grey and reaches for Calligos, closing its ugly clawed tentacles on the neck and piercing the heart of the Rogue Trader.{/n}

{n}The Arch-militant's smile becomes even more predatory. Blinking, you finally see the truth — here he is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, the Chaos energy rages wild around Worten the Grey and reaches for Calligos, closing its ugly clawed tentacles on the neck and piercing the heart of the Rogue Trader.{/n}

{n}The Arch-militant's smile becomes even more predatory. Blinking, you finally see the truth — here he is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, the Chaos energy rages wild around Worten the Grey and reaches for Calligos, closing its ugly clawed tentacles on the neck and piercing the heart of the Rogue Trader.{/n}

{n}The Arch-Militant's smile becomes even more bestial. You blink, and your eyes finally see the truth — there it is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, Chaos energy rages wildly around Worten the Grey, reaching for Calligos, trying to close its hideous clawed tentacles around the Rogue Trader's neck and pierce his heart.{/n}

{n}The Arch-Militant's smile becomes even more bestial. You blink, and your eyes finally see the truth — there it is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, Chaos energy rages wildly around Worten the Grey, reaching for Calligos, trying to close its hideous clawed tentacles around the Rogue Trader's neck and pierce his heart.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La sonrisa del Archimilitante se vuelve aún más bestial. Pestañeas y por fin distingues la verdad: ahí está, el epicentro de toda la corrupción. Como un torbellino negro, la energía del Caos se arremolina en torno a Worten el Gris y se extiende hacia Calligos, intentando agarrar al Comerciante Independiente por el cuello y atravesar su corazón.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arch-Militant's smile becomes even more bestial. You blink, and your eyes finally see the truth — there it is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, Chaos energy rages wildly around Worten the Grey, reaching for Calligos, trying to close its hideous clawed tentacles around the Rogue Trader's neck and pierce his heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La sonrisa del archimilitante se vuelve aún más aviesa. Pestañeas y por fin distingues la verdad: ahí está, el epicentro de toda la corrupción. Como un torbellino negro, la energía del Caos se arremolina en torno a Worten el Gris y se extiende hacia Calligos, entrelazando sus repugnantes tentáculos en su cuello y penetrando en el corazón del Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}首席战士的微笑变得更加充满兽性。转眼之间，你终于看到了真相——它才是这场腐化的中心。混沌的能量仿佛黑色的旋风，在灰斑沃尔腾身边疯狂肆虐，朝卡里戈斯靠了过去。它长着利爪的丑陋触手环在卡里戈斯脖子旁边，随后猛地刺穿了他的心脏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arch-Militant's smile becomes even more bestial. You blink, and your eyes finally see the truth — there it is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, Chaos energy rages wildly around Worten the Grey, reaching for Calligos, trying to close its hideous clawed tentacles around the Rogue Trader's neck and pierce his heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}首席战士的微笑变得更加充满掠夺性。转眼之间，你终于看到了真相——他才是这场腐化的中心。混沌的能量就像一股黑色的旋风，在灰斑沃尔腾身边疯狂肆虐，朝卡里戈斯靠了过去。它丑陋的利爪环在卡里戈斯脖子旁边，猛地刺穿了卡里戈斯的心脏。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le sourire de l'archimilitant se fait encore plus bestial. Lorsque vous clignez des yeux, vous voyez enfin la vérité : l'épicentre de la corruption se trouve ici même. Tel un tourbillon noir, l'énergie du Chaos se déchaîne sauvagement autour de Worten le Gris et atteint Calligos, essayant de refermer ses tentacules griffus sur son cou et de lui transpercer le cœur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arch-Militant's smile becomes even more bestial. You blink, and your eyes finally see the truth — there it is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, Chaos energy rages wildly around Worten the Grey, reaching for Calligos, trying to close its hideous clawed tentacles around the Rogue Trader's neck and pierce his heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire de l'archimilitant se fait encore plus bestial. Lorsque vous clignez des yeux, vous voyez enfin la vérité : l'épicentre de la corruption se trouve ici même. Tel un tourbillon noir, l'énergie du Chaos se déchaîne sauvagement autour de Worten le Gris et atteint Calligos, essayant de refermer ses tentacules griffus sur son cou et de lui transpercer le cœur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アーク・ミリタントの微笑みがさらに貪欲なものとなる。まばたきをすると、ようやく真実が見えてくる…それは、そこにあった。腐敗の中心地に。黒い渦巻きのように、混沌のエネルギーがヴォルテン・ザ・グレイの周囲で荒れ狂う。それはカリゴスに伸び、その醜い爪の触手で自由開拓者の首筋を掴み、心臓を貫こうとしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arch-Militant's smile becomes even more bestial. You blink, and your eyes finally see the truth — there it is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, Chaos energy rages wildly around Worten the Grey, reaching for Calligos, trying to close its hideous clawed tentacles around the Rogue Trader's neck and pierce his heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アーク・ミリタントの微笑みがさらに貪欲なものとなる。まばたきをすると、ようやく真実が見えてくる…それは、そこにあった。腐敗の中心地に。黒い渦巻きのように、混沌のエネルギーがヴォルテン・ザ・グレイの周囲で荒れ狂う。それはカリゴスに伸び、その醜い爪の触手で自由開拓者の首筋を掴み、心臓を貫こうとしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Grinsen des Erzmilitanten wird noch bestialischer. Du zwinkerst und erkennst endlich die Wahrheit ... das ist es, das Epizentrum der Verderbnis. Wie ein schwarzer Wirbelwind hüllt Chaosenergie Worten den Grauen ein, greift nach Calligos und versucht, seine klauenbewehrten Tentakel um den Hals {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu schlingen und {mf|sein|ihr} Herzu zu durchbohren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arch-Militant's smile becomes even more bestial. You blink, and your eyes finally see the truth — there it is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, Chaos energy rages wildly around Worten the Grey, reaching for Calligos, trying to close its hideous clawed tentacles around the Rogue Trader's neck and pierce his heart.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Grinsen des Erzmilitanten wird noch räuberischer. Blinzelnd erkennst du endlich die Wahrheit. Hier steht er, das Epizentrum der Verderbnis. Wie ein schwarzer Wirbelwind wütet die Chaosenergie um Worten den Grauen und streckt sich nach Calligos aus, legt ihre hässlichen Tentakel um den Hals und durchbohrt das Herz des Freihändlers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Başmilitan'ın gülümsemesi, daha da canavarımsı bir hâl alıyor. Gözünü açıp kapamanla birlikte en nihayetinde hakikati görüyorsun. İşte tam karşında yozlaşmanın odak noktası duruyor. Kaos enerjisi, kapkara bir girdap misali Gri Worten'ın etrafında hiddetlenerek Calligos'a ulaşıyor. Pençeli, menfur dokunaçlarını Hür Tacir'in boynuna dolayıp yüreğini delmeye çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arch-Militant's smile becomes even more bestial. You blink, and your eyes finally see the truth — there it is, the epicentre of corruption. Like a black whirlwind, Chaos energy rages wildly around Worten the Grey, reaching for Calligos, trying to close its hideous clawed tentacles around the Rogue Trader's neck and pierce his heart.{/n}
